src.sql:
SELECT *
, CASE WHEN InnameOchtend = 1 then '✔'
else '✖' end as InnameOchtendSymbol
, CASE WHEN InnameAvond = 1 then '✔'
else '✖' end as InnameAvondSymbol


FROM app.ortomo_Preparaat
WHERE Id=[tknparams:id]

Preparaat
Icon
InnameAdvies
TypeSupplement
InnameAvond
InnameOchtend
InnameOchtendSymbol
InnameAvondSymbol
